column4: what do i do when my feisty fawn desktop crashes ?  how do i track down error messages or something related to the crash ?
Haven't had that happen yet.  But it's no small order.
yes.  i am unsure where to start.  i use the desktop extensively and want to find out what to do about these crashes
There are several.  #ubuntu-desktop is a good place to start.
WOW!  That's odd.
odd and painful.
I only reboot when I need to shut down.
is that daily ?
I haven't had a single failure in Feisty Fawn at all.
Yes.  The only problems I've seen are clipboard related.
When I copy something to the clipboard from a window, then close the window, sometimes the clipboard is also cleared.
The only other odd thing I've noticed is that inactive windows with selected text somewhere will suddenly unselect or change color if, in the active window I begin selecting text.
I haven't had a one.  It's been the most stable OS I've used, apart from XP & Vista.
yes, i would like to track down what is causing this.  but i have no clues
Have you tried re-installing a fresh install to another partition?
Then slowly adding things one at a time until something goes boom?
no i havent done that recently,  but i did do it when fesity came out
Done what?
oh
That would be the way I would track it down.
Install separately, then add one by one.
Then I'd chalk it up to sunspots. :P
